# 𒈘 ≈ 𒈓

ADAMIN2 𒈘 Adamen = Leute² admin@Hindu !! ⇔ min=2

𒀀𒁕 a-da "fight?" ⇔ 𓂝 𓎛 𓄿 / 𓇋 𓎛 𓄿 𓂡
𒀀𒁕𒌋𒌋 a-da-min3 #teşētu 2 "contest" !
𒀀𒁕𒈫 a-da-min "dispute, debate" !
𒀀𒁕𒈫 adamin 𒂜 𒈓 𒈘 𒄒 𒉫 𒂛 adaminx; adamin; adamin2 ; adamin3 ; adamin4 ; adamin5 ; adaminx

adult 𒇿 #addalad < 𓀒 ⇔ 𓊪 𓊗 faɗi fate …fall ⇔ 𓏱 mortal 𒁁𒇽 𒇿 mortal 𓅓 𓏏 𓀐
